doc.field: Harry Randall: Fifteenth International Brigade Films and Photographs
Harry Randall: Fifteenth International Brigade Films and Photographs

Series IIA: Miscellaneous, August 1937 - May 1938. The 148 images in this series are among the earliest in the collection. Pictured here are scenes from the battles of Quinto and Belchite. Photographs of the aftermath of aerial bombardment offer evidence of damaged factories, homes and churches. Also documented are artillery units and battalions on the move, and troops under fire at Fuentes de Ebro, and soldiers dug into trenches at the Teruel front.
Harry Randall: Fifteenth International Brigade Films and Photographs
